definition[1]: a tool that you use for cutting wood. It has a flat blade with an edge cut into many V shapes.
definition[2]: a short familiar phrase or sentence that is considered to contain some truth about life
example[0]: That reminds me of the old saw about being careful about what you wish for.
definition[3]: to cut something using a saw
example[1]: She was in the backyard sawing logs.
example[2]: He sawed through a power cable by mistake.
